vsParam: Sensei gave you a "Healing Salve" and a "Puni Ball", right?

Puni Ball is an Attack Item.
When used in battle, it can deal damage to enemies.

It will come in handy whenever you [c][DF1FB2FF]cannot damage the enemy[-][/c]
or [c][DF1FB2FF]your skills are unavailable[-][/c].

Easy to make yet very useful, Puni Ball is among the first items to be
synthesized when you have enough ingredients.

For now, let's equip the Puni Ball.
Please, select the Puni Ball.
